channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Herd Effects
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Herd Effects

item.title: CVE-2024-3478|2024-05-02T06:00:03.481Z -- Unknown -- Herd Effects
item.description: The Herd Effects WordPress plugin before 5.2.7 does not have CSRF checks in some bulk actions, which could allow attackers to make logged in admins perform unwanted actions, such as deleting effects via CSRF attacks
